titleStmt.title: SII 4.850: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 850. (A.R. No. 37 of 1893). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . maturāntakappottappiccoḻa maṉumacittaracaṉ tirukkāḷattitevaṉāṉa kaṇṭakopālaṉeṉ jeyaṅko
ṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkoṭṭattuk kāñcipurattut tiruvattiyūr niṉṟaruḷiya Aruḷāḷapperumāḷukkuk kaṇṭa
kopālaṉcantikkum tiruvāṭittirunāḷukkum puraṭṭātittirunāḷukkum makappaṭikakum tiruppaṇikkum veṇṭu ṉiman
taṅkaḷukkum Iṟuttuviṭuvutāka Irājarājatevarkkup patiṉeṭṭāvatu viṭṭa pālāṟṟukku vaṭakkuk kacciyūrnāṭṭuk kāraṇai
nāṟperellaiyu muṭpaṭa Uḷḷūrttevatāṉam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam nikkik nikamukum Ilaikkoṭiyum paṭṭappāḻum naṉcai puṉcai
yuḷḷiṭṭa kaṭamaikaḷuṅ kācāya nellāya muḷḷiṭṭa Aṉaittāyaṅkaḷum puṟakkalaṉaiyum tirunāṭpaṭikaḷukkum kaṇṭakopālaṉcantikkum makappa
ṭikaḷukkum tiruppaṇikkum cantirātittavarai celvatāka viṭṭeṉ maturāntakappottappiccoḻaṉ maṉumacittaracaṉ tirukkāḷattitevaneṉ .
Digital edition of SII 4.850 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
